ygData.subject: Re: Crystal Numbers
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes!! ...  What I sometimes do is play 2 Constant songs and 1 pulse song. So I might start with Jonathan s then start Chant then start Restoration. After
ygData.messageBody:
Yes!!

> Bard songs fit into two categories,
> in my opinion, pulse songs and constant songs. Constant songs
>have an
> effect that lasts as long as the icon is on your screen.
<snip>

What I sometimes do is play 2 Constant songs and 1 pulse song.
So I might start with Jonathan's then start Chant then start
Restoration. After 1 get the "your wounds are begining to heal"
message I start Jonathan's and then repeat. Sometimes I take a
rest after each Jonathan's as it is the "primary" song.

If I get it just right I can keep the 2 Constant songs and get a pulse
ever so often as well.

The effects of Anthem dont last as long as Jonathan's, so that
strategy does not work as well with Anthem.

I think I am better off stacking just Jonathan's and Anthem at this
stage. Like you suggested in another post.


John I have a question,
Does the after effects of songs get longer as you go up in levels?
An after effect is when the song icon is displayed but you are now
singing a different song.

T.
